There is no try.âStop wasting time and thinking what to eat, from now start eat healthy delicious recipes.MAIN FEATURES:1. Facebook Login only.2. You get one healthy meal each day3. Make friends with other Daybiteheroes. Follow them give them like, and leave comments.4. Add your own healthy recipe and share with friends on: Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Tumblr5. Watch activity with great recipes in6. Customize your profile to achieve your goal.7. reviews.title: A lot of potential but falls flat
reviews.comment: It keeps giving me the same recipe every day and I can\'t go through the recipes I\'ve liked. There also aren\'t many recipes, maybe that\'s due to not enough users posting them?? Also there aren\'t categories to search through, that would make it a lot easier. Maybe I just don\'t understand how to use it? Uninstalling unless changes are made.
reviews.author: Jennifer D

reviews.comment: I do not have a facebook and was unable to use this app.
reviews.author: Jasmine Betancourt

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t login with facebook said it had to email me first. Wth? It made no sense.
reviews.author: Laura Nieting

reviews.title: Attack on privacy
reviews.comment: Needs a Facebook login and post on your behalf! Is not adapted for men. Worst of similar apps.
reviews.author: Nihad Hasic

reviews.title: Total BS
reviews.comment: I dont want to use my fb to log in and there is no other option
reviews.author: Shahab Z

reviews.title: Choices
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t allow you to choose a type of diet such as low-fat or vegan
reviews.author: A Google User
